name: 8th International Conference on Big Data Analysis and Data Mining August 09-10, 2021 Zurich, Switzerland
content: Theme: “Knowledge discovery in databases: Step towards recovering economy after the pandemic: Covid-19” 8th International Conference on Big Data Analysis and Data Mining August 09-10, 2021 Zurich, Switzerland We are taking the opportunity by inviting you all and welcome to join our 8th International Conference on Big Data Analysis and Data Mining August 09-10, 2021 Zurich, Switzerland with a theme “Knowledge discovery in databases: Step towards recovering economy after the pandemic: Covid-19” Data Mining 2021 cordially invites all participants across the globe to attend the 8th International Conference on Big Data Analysis and Data Mining (Data Mining 2021) which is going to be held during August 09 -10, 2021 in Zurich, Switzerland to share the “Knowledge discovery in databases: Step towards recovering economy after the pandemic: Covid-19” Data Mining 2021 would lay a platform for the interaction between experts around the world and aims in accelerating scientific discoveries. The main theme of the conference is “Knowledge discovery in databases: Step towards recovering economy after the pandemic: Covid-19". Conference website: https://datamining.expertconferences.org Who can attend? Data Mining 2021 brings together individuals who have an interest in different fields of, Engineering, Data Science, Big Data Analytics, Artificial Intelligence, Cloud Computing ,Social Network Analysis, Business Analytics, Nanoinformatics, Renewable Energy Forecasting with Big Data, Communication Engineering, Information technology. Why to Attend??? Data Mining 2021 invites attendees from around the world focused on learning about Data Mining, this would be one of best opportunity to reach the largest assemblage of participants from the Data Science community. Conduct demonstrations, distribute information, meet with current and potential customers, make a splash with a new product line, and receive name recognition at this 2-day event. World-renowned speakers, the most recent techniques, tactics, and the newest updates in Data Mining fields are hallmarks of this conference. Contact: Suzane Jones Conference Director Data Mining 2021 Email: admin@engineeringmeetings.com
